TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户使用该控件可以编辑关联 控件的几个用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是派生自一个编辑器控件类，并用于编辑影响的行为的一个关联的属性或控件。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated or control. 正如在 Web 部件控件集中面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息，请参阅类概述)，面向工具的部件控件 （工具部分），并且每个工具部分必须驻留在某个特定类型的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone. 在 Web 部件控件集中的工具部件具有两个显著特征：Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是启用最终用户进行个性化设置 Web 部件页上的控件的帮助器控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它们是仅在特定显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain display modes. 控件是一个工具部件，将变得可见，仅当 Web 部件页处于编辑模式，以及时特定控件已被选定进行编辑。The control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控件，与所有其他值一样控制，驻留在控件。The control, like all other controls, resides in an control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含控件，并控件不能放在任何其他类型的区域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 在页上，在某些情况下不显示控件。The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions. 如果上的属性值正在编辑的控件是`true`，和页面的用户个性化设置范围 （这是默认值），该控件不显示。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 有关控件要显示在此方案中，通常需要执行两个步骤：For the control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - 将条目添加到 Web.config 文件中提供一个授权的用户权限以便编辑共享个性化设置范围 （这意味着用户所做的更改将应用程序的所有用户可见） 中的 Web 页。Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application). - 以编程方式更改页从用户级来共享级别个性化设置范围在运行时，例如通过使用方法。Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the method. 有关如何使示例控件在页上可见，请参阅本主题的示例部分。For an example of how to make the control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic. 有关共享的控件和个性化设置范围的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). 类还具有一个重要的方法， ，它继承类，并重写。The class also has an important method, , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 该方法非常重要，因为它使获取属性值从控制正在编辑，并将其分配到编辑控件的字段。The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control. 在大多数情况下，控件应使用以页持久性格式声明``元素内的``元素，后者又包含由``在网页上的元素。In most cases, the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 控件使最终用户能够编辑以下 UI 属性的控件：The control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a control: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要编辑其他属性和行为控件，你可以使用其他随 Web 部件控件集提供的控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括，则，和控件。These controls include the , the , and the control. 所提供控件应提供编辑所需的大多数编辑功能控件，但您还可以通过继承创建自定义编辑器控件类。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅类概述。For a code example, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件中呈现`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素中用于编辑的控件的相关的集分组控件使用，而且可以简化这些控件之间的可视用户代理 （如普通的 Web 浏览器） 和语音的用户代理 （的选项卡式的导航如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能不符合可访问性标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明控件在网页上，并使其能够编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件和一个控件，用于编辑的行为属性控件。A Web page that contains an control and a control, which is used to edit the behavior properties of a control. - 要使在 Web.config 文件中提供要编辑共享个性化设置范围中的页的获授权的用户权限的项。An entry to make in the Web.config file to give an authorized user permission to edit the page in shared personalization scope. - 该示例时加载的页面在浏览器工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 为此用户控件文档说明了如何调用方法以将页切换到共享模式，从而使控件显示。The documentation for this user control explains how to call the method to switch the page into shared mode, which enables the control to appear. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#5)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的声明性引用控件，其中的子``元素，其中包含对的声明性引用控件。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to a control. 请注意，此页还包含控件绑定到 Pubs 数据库中，因为此控件位于，它便可以充当控件可以编辑的控件。Note that the page also contains a control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a , it is able to function as a control that can be edited by the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分是 Web.config 文件中的条目。The third part of the example is an entry in the Web.config file. 你必须生成一个条目如下所示在``部分中的文件，以启用授权的用户或组的用户来编辑 Web 页处于共享个性化设置范围。You must make an entry like the following in the `` section of the file, to enable an authorized user or set of users to edit the Web page when it is in shared personalization scope. 此项是一个关键步骤;否则为控件在将页切换到编辑模式时将不可见。This entry is a critical step; otherwise, the control will not be visible when you switch the page into edit mode. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 当在浏览器页面加载时，您可以首先选择**共享**选项卡上**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can first select the **Shared** option on the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 接下来，单击下拉列表本身，并选择**编辑模式**页切换到编辑模式。Next, click the drop-down list itself, and select **Edit Mode** to switch the page into edit mode. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）**作者列表 web 部件**控件，然后单击**编辑**开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到控制和位于其上方的按钮和文本的框。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 如果编辑的用户界面和单击进行一些更改**Apply**按钮，可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看完整的编辑更改的效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 创建该类的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认值; 没有构造函数声明中类，因此没有特殊任务执行时创建类的新实例。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. 通常情况下不需要使用构造函数，因为您可以添加到以声明方式在设计时的页面的控件。Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a control to a page declaratively at design time. 但是，如果您需要添加控件以编程方式出于某种原因，您可以使用构造函数。However, if you need to add a control programmatically for some reason, you can use the constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 该方法的用途是保存用户已设置的值控件关联的对应属性控件。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 关联的控件中引用控件的继承属性。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. 方法尝试设置多个的用户界面 (UI) 的相关属性值关联控件。The method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated control. 在此方法中设置的属性值的列表，请参阅中的备注部分类概述。For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the class overview. 在用户单击确定的谓词或编辑用户界面中的应用谓词时调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.

exception.span: 尝试设置关联 控件的属性值时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }

Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String

member this.DefaultButton : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件默认按钮的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.

value.span: 包含默认按钮 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以在属性上设置几个属性。The property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property. 不能使用主题，使用该属性，它不能浏览与设计时用户界面 (UI)。The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI). 从基属性值中检索属性的值。The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的值为`true`，这意味着，将显示该控件，但一个的情况除外。The property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case. 如果上的属性值正在编辑的控件是`true`，和页面的用户个性化设置范围 （这是默认值），该控件不显示。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 有关所需的步骤的说明和代码示例演示如何会导致控件显示以进行编辑，，请参阅类概述和代码示例。For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the control to be displayed for editing, see the class overview and code example. 设计 Web 部件控件集有一个假设，共享控件-对所有用户可见的控件应显示用于编辑只当页面意味着编辑在共享的个性化设置范围内已更改的所有用户均可见。The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 从 控件检索属性值并将这些属性值分配给关联 控件。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 它实现方法从基类中，检索从关联的当前值控件，并更新中的控件使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 调用方法时在关联的值控件可能已更改。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 有关控件，包含控件调用区域方法，以便中的值控件始终同步中关联的值与控件。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值显示在标题栏的控制该控件在编辑模式中可见。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 当控件在页面中声明时，可以将值设置`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，特定于区域性的默认值用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码演示如何设置标题以声明方式在网页中的控件。The following code shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的下一部分演示如何设置的值属性以编程方式。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#3)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）**作者列表 web 部件**控件，然后单击**编辑**开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到控制和位于其上方的按钮和文本的框。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 请注意，标题控件是在 Web 页的声明性标记分配给它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果您输入一些文本在文本框中下一步**更新编辑器部件标题**按钮，然后依次按钮，标题为更新的控件。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
